net.cloud.mmo.nio.packet

Class PacketFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.cloud.mmo.nio.packet.PacketFactory

  • public class PacketFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Typical factory class, meant to create Packets. The methods are not static - a factory object must be created for use. PacketSender will use this factory to create and write packets. PacketSender has methods to create, write, and send each packet. Direct usage of this factory is also possible, but not recommended to maintain design structure.

    • Method Detail

      • createTestPacket

        public Packet createTestPacket(int value)
        Creates a TestPacket, which is just an integer of the given value

      • createCompositePacket

        public Packet createCompositePacket(Packet first,
                                    Packet... others)
        Creates a CompositePacket, a Packet made of other packets. (Possibly including another composite packet...) This is useful for ensuring multiple packets are sent together and dealt with in a precise order.
        Parameters:
        first - The first packet that the composite will consist of
        others - Any other packets the new packet will consist of

      • createLoginResponse

        public Packet createLoginResponse(LoginPacket.LoginResponse response)
        Create a response to a client which requested to login.
        Parameters:
        response - The response (to the credentials they sent)
